
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(yt-comp_nodes-dq)
target_compile_options(yt-comp_nodes-dq PRIVATE
  -Wno-unused-parameter
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)
target_include_directories(yt-comp_nodes-dq PUBLIC
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/providers/yt/comp_nodes/dq
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/providers/yt/comp_nodes/dq/contrib/ydb/library/yql/minikql/computation
)
target_include_directories(yt-comp_nodes-dq PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/flatbuffers/include
)
target_link_libraries(yt-comp_nodes-dq PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  minikql-computation-llvm
  providers-yt-comp_nodes
  providers-yt-codec
  providers-common-codec
  core-formats-arrow
  cpp-mapreduce-interface
  cpp-mapreduce-common
  cpp-yson-node
  yt-yt-core
  public-udf-arrow
  libs-apache-arrow
  contrib-libs-flatbuffers
  yt-yt-client
  yt-client-arrow
  yt-lib-yt_rpc_helpers
)
target_sources(yt-comp_nodes-dq PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/providers/yt/comp_nodes/dq/stream_decoder.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/providers/yt/comp_nodes/dq/dq_yt_rpc_reader.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/providers/yt/comp_nodes/dq/dq_yt_rpc_helpers.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/providers/yt/comp_nodes/dq/dq_yt_block_reader.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/providers/yt/comp_nodes/dq/dq_yt_reader.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/providers/yt/comp_nodes/dq/dq_yt_factory.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/providers/yt/comp_nodes/dq/dq_yt_writer.cpp
)
copy_file(
